entries.transmission_start: Brother Extok Evin: < Our shuttles has started calculating their lightspeed jumps. The fleet commander estimate that they need about six minutes. >
entries.transmission_received: Brother Extok Evin: < Our last shuttle is jumping to lightspeed as we speak, amazing job pilot! >
entries.trans_update: Brother Extok Evin: < %DI percent of the personnel shuttles have jumped to lightspeed. Keep it up! >
entries.title_d: The Inquisition has somehow found out about the route through the Endor system that some of our freighters carrying Vortex personnel to safety are using. They are sending their elite fighters to the area and we need you to block one of the possible attack routes the Inquisition may take, long enough for the freighters to get to safety.
entries.title: Endor system: Prevent the Imperial fleet from destroying personnel shuttles.
entries.split_quest_alert_fail: Brother Extok Evin: < All may not be lost, most of the freighters have managed to get away even though the defense broke at some points. We have a distress call from a freighter though, need you to investigate. >
entries.split_quest_alert: Brother Extok Evin: < A target of opportunity has opened up, stand by for further instructions. >
entries.quest_reachpoint_d: This is the area you have been assigned to protect.
entries.quest_location_d: The Endor system has a high concentration of Imperial forces and many of them are heading your way! I would be very surprised if you won't at least run in to a few in the area you have been ordered to intercept.
entries.quest_defendpoint_d: Don't let any enemy ships pass you by pilot, those freighters can not defend themselves against Imperial bombers or fighters.
entries.outofrange_failed: Brother Extok Evin: < You let them slip by you, our shuttles are trying to perform emergency jumps to hyperspace! >
entries.outofrange: Brother Extok Evin: < You're too far away from your assigned coordinates, get back there quickly! >
entries.mission_complete: Brother Extok Evin: < Great work pilot, our shuttles are safe! >
entries.found_loc: You've been assigned this sector to block any Imperial ships coming through that route. Get over there quickly.
entries.first_attack: This will get rough pilot, the Empire is sending heavy forces from several directions. The life of those people is in your hands!
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.arrived_at_loc: You are in your assigned sector. Prevent any Imperial ships from getting past you pilot!
